FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of concurrent TWAMP-Test sessions by clients with an IP address in a specific prefix. A new test session (described by a Request-TW-Session message) is rejected if accepting it would cause either the limit defined by this command or the server limit (max-sess-server) to be exceeded.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of concurrent test sessions. Values-0 to 128. ParamDefault: Default- 32
